## Habitat DB
```kroki-blockdiag
blockdiag {
  orientation = portrait

  // Define the blocks
  A [label="CCM & HydroAtlas"];
  B [label="FR"];
  C [label="ES"];
  D [label="SE"];
  E [label="CCM | Topo | Habitat | Eel | Salmon | Trout"];
  F [label="NAT | Topo | Habitat | Eel | Salmon | Trout"];



  A -> B -> E,F;
  A -> C -> E,F;
  A -> D -> E,F;

  group {
    B; C; D; // Group them on the same level
  }

  group {
    E; F; // Ensure E and F are at the same horizontal level
  }
}
```
